data.title: 30 popular blonde actresses in their 30s at the height of their careers
data.meta_description: Discover blonde actresses in their 30s who keep viewers glued to the screen. The article lists actresses who are deemed attractive and shares mini-bios about them.
data.text:
In contemporary popular culture, blonde women are often viewed as more attractive than women with other hair colors. This is why many celebrities seem to be more well-liked when they have blonde hair. Check some of the world's most famous blonde actresses in their 30s below.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

4. Kirsten Zien - 33 years

This article lists actresses with natural blonde hair. This hair type is often associated with youthfulness and innocence- a perception that can be traced back to fairy tales and folklore. As a result, many celebrities dye their hair blonde to appear youthful and attractive, and those born with this type of hair are considered lucky.

Blonde actresses in their 30s

In Western culture, blonde hair has long been associated with beauty and vitality. For instance, Aphrodite, the ancient Greek goddess of love and beauty, was described as having blonde hair. So, here are some of the blonde actresses who are considered very attractive:

RankingBlonde actressesAge (as of August 2024)1.Emma Roberts33 years2.Saoirse Ronan30 years3.Madison Riley34 years4.Kirsten Zien33 years5.Blake Lively36 years6.Bonnie Sveen35 years7.Brie Larson34 years8.Kenzie Dalton36 years9.Hayden Panettiere34 years10.Brooklyn Decker37 years11.Lucy Boynton30 years12.AnnaLynne McCord37 years13.Diana Agron37 years14.Hillary Duff36 years15.Imogen Poots35 years

Many blonde actresses flourish because their looks give them an advantage in the movie business. So, most capitalize on what blonde hair offers and often reach the peak of their careers between 30 and 39. Below are some of the world's top blonde actresses in their 30s:

1. Emma Roberts - 33 years

Full name: Emma Rose Roberts

Birthdate: 10 February 1991

Age: 33 years (as of August 2024)

Birthplace: Rhinebeck Village, Rhinebeck, New York, USA

Parents: Eric Roberts, Kelly Cunningham

Partner(s): Evan Peters (2012-2019), Garrett Hedlund (2019-2022), Cody John (2022-present)

Height: 1.57 meters

Career: Actress, singer, and producer

Emma Roberts got into the limelight when she played in Unfabulous (2004–2007). Prior to this, she had been featured in Blow (2001). Emma Roberts' other films include Aquamarine (2006), Valentine's Day (2010), Paradise Hills (2019), Scream Queens (2015–2016), and American Horror Story (2013–present).

2. Saoirse Ronan - 30 years

Full name: Saoirse Una Ronan

Birthdate: 12 April 1994

Age: 30 years (as of August 2024)

Birthplace: The Bronx, New York, USA

Parents: Monica (née Brennan), Paul Ronan

Partner: Jack Lowden

Height: 1.68 meters

Career: Actress

Ronan was three years old when her family moved with her back to Ireland and settled in the small village of Ardattin in County Carlow. Saoirse Ronan made her acting debut in the Irish series The Clinic (2003) and her film debut in I Could Never Be Your Woman (2007). She had her breakthrough role as a precocious teenager in Atonement (2007).

3. Madison Riley - 34 years

Full name: Madison Riley

Birthdate: 16 March 1990

Age: 34 years (as of August 2024)

Birthplace: Salt Lake City, Utah, USA

Parents: Patricia and Michael Riley

Height: 1.75 meters

Career: Actress

Madison Riley made her career debut when she gave voice in Blatz: Passion for Fashion-Diamonds. The actress has starred in movies like Fired Up! (2009), Grown Ups (2010), and Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List (2015). Madison Riley has also appeared in TV shows like Pair of Kings (2010) and Jonas (2009).

4. Kirsten Zien - 33 years

Full name: Kirsten Zien

Birthdate: 28 September 1990

Age: 33 years (as of August 2024)

Birthplace: Vancouver, Canada

Spouse: Matt Zien (2017-present)

Children: 2

Height: 1.63 meters

Career: Actress

Kirsten Zien is famous for her roles in the TV series The Linda McCartney Story (2000), The Lying Game (2011-2012), and Dear White People (2017). The Canadian actress also found success in Hollywood. Some of Kirsten Zien's film appearances are in The Twilight Saga (2010) and Elektra (2005).

5. Blake Lively - 36 years

Full name: Blake Ellender Lively

Birthdate: 25 August 1987

Age: 36 years (as of August 2024)

Birthplace: Tarzana, Los Angeles, California, USA

Parents: Ernie Lively, Elaine Lively

Spouse: Ryan Reynolds (2012-present)

Children: 4

Height: 1.78 meters

Career: Actress

Blake Lively made her professional debut in her dad's film Sandman (1998). After that, she had her breakthrough playing in The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants (2005) and its 2008 sequel. Blake Lively is also known for movies like Accepted (2006), The Town (2010), Savages (2012), and Green Lantern (2011).

6. Bonnie Sveen - 35 years

Full name: Bonnie Sveen

Birth year: 1989

Age: 35 years (as of August 2024)

Birthplace: Tasmania, Australia

Parents: Rob Sveen, Leanne Sveen

Partner: Nathan Gooley (2015-present)

Children: 2

Height: 1.63 meters

Career: Actress

Sveen is among the many Australian actresses who have found their footing in Hollywood. She debuted in the film industry through the movie Before the Rain (2010). Bonnie Sveen's talent can also be seen in movies like Home and Away (2015) and The Secret Daughter (2016).

7. Brie Larson - 34 years

Full name: Brianne Sidonie Desaulniers

Birthdate: 1 October 1989

Age: 34 years (as of August 2024)

Birthplace: Sacramento, California, USA

Parents: Sylvain Desaulniers, Heather Desaulniers

Height: 1.7 meters

Career: Actress

Brianne Desaulniers, better known as Brie Larson, is famed for her roles as a teenager in movies. She started acting in 1998 in blockbusters and independent films. Some of Brie Larson's popular movies and TV series include Hoot (2006), Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (2010), and United States of Tara (2009–2011).

8. Kenzie Dalton - 36 years

Full name: Kenzie Dalton

Birthdate: 7 March 1988

Age: 36 years (as of August 2024)

Height: 1.56 meters

Career: Actress and model

Some of the legendary movies in which Kenzie Dalton has appeared in are A Dark Foe (2020), One Tree Hill (2003), and CSI: Miami (2002). The actress is also known for her charity work and supporting organizations like Community United Effort and Falling Whistles. In addition, some of the top brands she has modeled for are Tommy Hilfiger, Levi, Payless, and Alisha Hill.

9. Hayden Panettiere - 34 years

Full name: Hayden Lesley Panettiere

Parents: Lesley Vogel, Skip Panettiere

Children: 1

Height: 1.53 meters

Career: Actress, model, and singer

Panettiere is best known for her roles on Heroes (2006-2010), Scream (2011-2023), and Nashville (2012-2018). The actress has had more appearances in TV shows like Guiding Light (1996-2000) and Ally McBeal (2002). Hayden Panettiere has also been cast in movies like A Bug's Life (1998) and Amanda Knox: Murder on Trial in Italy (2011).

10. Brooklyn Decker - 37 years

Height: 1.75 meters

Brooklyn Decker is best known for appearing in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit issue. Her first professional role in a film was in Just Go With It (2011). Afterward, Brooklyn Decker has featured in more movies and TV shows like Battleship (2012), What to Expect When You're Expecting (2012), and Grace and Frankie (2015-2022).

11. Lucy Boynton - 30 years

Full name: Lucy Boynton

Parents: Adriaane Pielou, Graham Boynton

Partners: Rami Malek (2017-2023), Murdo Mitchell (2023-present)

Lucy Boynton was raised in London. She made her professional debut as the young Beatrix Potter in Miss Potter (2006). Actress Lucy Boynton has also appeared in Ballet Shoes (2007), Sense and Sensibility (2008), Mo (2010), The Blackcoat's Daughter (2015), Sing Street (2016), and other film and TV productions.

AnnaLynne McCord is known for her vixen-type roles. She first gained prominence in the FX television series Nip/Tuck (2007). Diana Agron is among the beautiful blonde actresses in their late 30s. After dancing and starring in musical theater productions in her youth, she made her screen debut in Heroes (2006). Dianna Agron has had incredible career success since then. She has been featured in movies like I Am Number Four (2011),The Family (2015), and As They Made Us (2019).

Imogen Poots is known for her roles in 28 Weeks Later (2007), The Look of Love (2013), and Need for Speed (2014). She was later cast in other projects, including The Father (2020) and The Teacher (2023). Imogen Poots has not reached her peak career point but is determined to make it big in Hollywood.

Since then, Amanda Seyfried has had roles in numerous movies and series, including All My Children (2003), Mean Girls (2004), Veronica Mars (2004–2006), and Big Love (2006–2011).

Margot Robbie is among the most loved blonde TV actresses. She has been in the entertainment industry since 2008. Margot Robbie has starred in more than a dozen movies. Some are About Time (2013), The Wolf of Wall Street (2013), Birds of Prey (2020), and Barbie (2023).

What blonde actress is similar to Marilyn Monroe?

Marilyn Monroe was not the only blonde platinum woman of her time. Actresses like Susan Griffiths, Jayne Mansfield, and Suzie Kennedy looked like her.

Who is the influencer who looks like Marilyn?

YouTuber Jasmine Chiswell has built her name online by recreating iconic Monroe looks.

Who stole Marilyn Monroe's style?

Monroe's influence on fashion and style has never lessened. Some famous actresses and singers who have copied her style at one point in their careers are:

Madonna

Who was the blonde actress in the 30s?

Marilyn Monroe is the famous blonde actress who died in her 30s. She was 36 when she passed away on 4 August 1962 inside her home in Brentwood, Los Angeles, California. Her body was discovered before dawn the following morning.

Blonde actresses in their 30s put vigor and enthusiasm into what they do. These thriving actresses challenge themselves with diverse roles. Most began as child/teen stars and have grown in the industry. So, the 30s are the golden years for most of these actresses.

Yen.com.gh published an article about celebrity nose jobs. Many celebrities deny they have undergone plastic surgery, but the celebrity nose jobs before and after pictures say otherwise.

You can do a nose job for aesthetics or if you have a health problem, such as a deviated septum. The surgery can help you breathe better.

Source: YEN.com.gh
